synopsis.text:
Its leader, the formidable Saiyan Turlus, has planted the Tree of Might on Earth, a destructive force that drains the planet's life energy to fuel its growth and bestow infinite power upon Turlus. Son Goku and his Z Warriors must rise to the challenge and thwart Turlus' sinister plans. But as the tree's roots spread chaos and destruction, the heroes face a grueling battle against the space pirates and their ruthless leader.

With the fate of Earth hanging in the balance, Goku and his friends are the last line of defense against the evil Turlus, who grows stronger by consuming the tree's fruit. In a desperate struggle, Goku must protect his son Gohan and save their home from the clutches of this devastating force. Will Goku's strength be enough to overcome Turlus and restore peace to the planet? The thrilling adventure unfolds as the Z Warriors fight to save Earth from the Tree of Might.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
